alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:40PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lackawanna and west central Wayne Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 140 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tompkinsville, or near Carbondale, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Carbondale, Archbald, Jessup, Jermyn, Mayfield, South Canaan, Waymart, Vandling, Tompkinsville and Mount Cobb. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
